dialogue.line: heheheheheh i knew you'd do the funny
how are you here i literally rapped with you
yea but im ronnie not ron from that mod called Vs Ron 3.0 that you should play
some of the people who worked on this mod worked for Vs Ron 3.0 as well!
the mod is really high quality and both The Bamber Team and the Vs Ron team support one another!
what the fuck are you on about
fuck you mean "the bamber team" did that green little shit make a cult or something
